message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I believe it has tremendous value and I'm confident you'll see its worth. I'm willing to start the conversation with an offer of $1,200,000. What are your thoughts?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I see the value in the product, but that price point is a little high for me. Could we work something out closer to $900,000?

Bob, I understand where you're coming from, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1,050,000. This is my best compromise, but I'm open to further discussion if you're willing to meet me at this price.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, Alice.  To be totally transparent, my absolute top end is $950,000. If you're able to make that work, I'm ready to close the deal today.

Bob, I can see you're being transparent, and I appreciate that. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $950,000. I'm willing to make one more concession, and I'll meet you at $975,000. This is my final offer, and I hope you can see the value in the product at this price.
